metadata.dc:author: Fortuny, P
Navarrete, M L
Pérez, M
Grasa, J
Calderón, R
Mesa, M
Raguer, N
Céspedes, R
metadata.dc:description: Recurrent facial palsy is noted infrequently in the literature. We present a comparative study of recurrent Bell's palsy (RBP) with regard to non-recurrent Bell's palsy (NRBP). Afterwards we compare among RBP cases those of ipsilateral recurrence (RRBP) to those of contralateral one (ARBP). We constate that non-recurrent Bell'palsy formes behave similarly to the contralateral recurrent forms.
metadata.dc:title: Parálisis facial de Bell recurrente: nuestra experiencia.
[Recurrent Bell's facial palsy: our experience].
